website_summaries.verdict: This pair of defrosting trays is a must-have for anyone who barbecues on a regular basis, and its ability to thaw meat extra-quickly makes an excellent gift, too.
pros: Completely defrosts wide range of foods within an hour
Nonstick surface is easy to clean
cons: On the pricey side, but you get a large area for defrosting

customer_reviews.title: Does not work!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on the good reviews of “this defrosted my 10lb ham in under 30 minutes!”, etc. It certainly does not do that. I’ve used it twice, once with some chicken thighs and a second time with a 1lb block of ground meat. An hour later, both times, my meat was still completely frozen. I am returning this.
customer_reviews.author: taylor

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Works as it should, saves me a ton of time thawing out dinners after a long day!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: CQ Essentials Rapid Thaw Plate Went HAM on my Holiday Ham
customer_reviews.text: CQ Essentials Rapid Thaw Plate went HAM on my Holiday ham. It thawed the 19lb hunk of meat in under 30 min. I use it all the time and it always delivers. Must buy!
customer_reviews.author: C.R. Hetzel

customer_reviews.title: Pretty awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love these plates, so doesn't my family. We tend to cook a lot of meat. We even stacked the meat and put one plate on the bottom and top and it was thawed in less than 2 hours. To clean is easy! When you're done thawing your mountain of meat just rinse and wash with soap and warm water!
customer_reviews.author: Mary S.

customer_reviews.title: BEST BUY EVER SO HAPPY
customer_reviews.text: I ABSOLUTELY LOVE THIS ITEM. I BOUGHT IT BECAUSE I SAW SOMEONE ON TIK TOK GIVING IT A REVIEW SO I HAD TO TRY. FOR SOMEONE WHO DOESN'T HAVE A LOT OF TIME TO COOK THIS HELPS. CUTS TIME IN HALF LESS THAN 30 I CAN DEFROST. I ORDERED TWO DIFFERENT SIZES THINKING THEY WERE BIG(FROM THE PICTURE) NOT. I GAVE THE SMALLER ONE TO MY SISTER. LOL WHICH WAS NOT THAT FAR OFF THE LARGER ONE I KEPT FOR MYSELF BUT I WILL BE ORDERING AGAIN FOR A LARGER SIZE. I ALSO WILL BE ORDERING THIS AS A GIFT TO EVERYONE! JUST TO ADD BE CAREFUL IT SCRATCHES EASILY DON'T USE FOR CUTTING BOARD.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Meh wouldn’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: Took about the same amount of time thawing, as if I had just placed the piece of meat on the cabinet at room temp for several hours. Not worth the time. As to the build of the item, seems very well made and sturdy but didn’t work as described.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany F. Soukup

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't deliver.
customer_reviews.text: There are four rubber tips on each defroster. They fall off at the slightest touch and must be placed on again or the product is lopsided. The tips are small and easy to lose. I wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Quality/Value Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: I love that 2 sizes were included. I was able to keep the smaller one for myself and gift the larger one to a friend. I don't actually understand the mechanics of how this works, but it does indeed work! In our house we never decide what to have for dinner until late afternoon, which makes this perfect! I can take steaks from the freezer, put them on the tray, and they're ready to grill in under 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: jorgal74

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I really like it when something works as advertised, and this does. We did a test to see how fast it would take to defrost a steak, wow, works great. Now I don't need to use the microwave as a back-up when I forget to take something out for dinner! Thank you..
customer_reviews.author: just shopping

customer_reviews.title: Game changer!
customer_reviews.text: If you're like me, you often forget to lay out something for supper. I can't tell you how many times we ordered out because I failed to plan. I ordered these and to be honest I was very skeptical. But I can thaw meat on these in no time. Another thing I love about these is that the silicone edges come off for easy cleaning. I have used this on ground beef, chicken, steak, shrimp and chili. Love this item!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works very quickly
customer_reviews.text: While these are not as thick as I prefer, and they have soft plastic feet that fall of very time I use them, I have to admit they work very well. I thought I'd try these, but I won't buy them again or recommend them. I prefer the ones with cast on feet and thicker plate bodies. They only cost a bit more but they are worth it to avoid the hassle of hunting for the feet when you pull it out of the cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: plumbob

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Works just like it should and I can't believe it took me this long to get one. Biggest regret not getting it faster. My food is ready and thawed by 5 hrs no water no microwaving. I usually thaw out 2 lbs hamburger it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Shanoah

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Trays do exactly as advertised. 3 lbs chicken breasts thawed in 2 hours. Was thinking about this purchase for a while. Glad I finally decided to buy this. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Marilouise W.

customer_reviews.title: Clean, easy to use, saved me time
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I hate putting my meat in the microwave to defrost, and this has definitely helped me out. 5 stars for the convince of 2! Hate doing dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Scheer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and it shows.
customer_reviews.text: This is super light weight and compact. The aluminum tray is very thin resulting in decreased temperature dispersion for a slower defrost than expected. But, the real detractor here is the corner pieces. They are ill-fitting silicon and fall off constantly. This is problematic because the tray needs air beneath for heat conduction. It was cheap, and it shows.
customer_reviews.author: RootsDeepInTheSky

customer_reviews.title: Thawing helper in the kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: Lay meat to thaw on it & it lowers the time it takes to thaw!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Got as a gift for my boss who loves to cook he said he loved it was able to defrost a chicken in about 2 hours
customer_reviews.author: Tania

customer_reviews.title: Product was open
customer_reviews.text: This item was opened and looks like it was used... It didn’t work and it looks like I am stuck with it since Amazon has no customer service employees to talk to...
customer_reviews.author: Amy D

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Saves so much time when I forget to take meat out of the freezer for dinner
customer_reviews.author: Emily Hopton

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be well made
customer_reviews.text: Don't know how well this product will perform as I've not used it yet
customer_reviews.author: Katie K.

customer_reviews.title: Yes, it works!
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these years ago. Lost it in a divorce and never replaced it, until now. Perfect for the absent-minded cook who forgets to take stuff out of the freezer in the morning for supper the same night.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy May Moses

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Product works just as describes, defrosts meats way faster than if you were to leave it in the fridge. The rubber corners tend to easily slip off, but no big deal
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Young

customer_reviews.title: Home cooked meal
customer_reviews.text: great idea .... We have to eat out all the time because I always forget to take something out but now ... we stay at home because it defrost quickly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Save your money, just use hot water.
customer_reviews.text: DOES NOT WORK!! Product is aN absolute waste of money. I’m trying to return the 2 sets I purchased, but was only given a QR code and I live 2 hours from the nearest UPS store, so this is making it impossible to return. I can’t even find a way to message the seller about this issue🙄
customer_reviews.author: Randie Moritz

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The issues are 1. It does not seam to help the thawing out time 2. The orange edges keep coming off. Now I have lost one and it sd its lop sideed.
customer_reviews.author: Marilynn

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Corner pads fit very loosely. All you have to do is look at them and they fall off. Junk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This worked great and I'm very pleased with it. Bonus that it's a set of 2, so now I have an extra to keep in our RV.
customer_reviews.author: suebear37

customer_reviews.title: No difference in Thawing
customer_reviews.text: Definitely did not see the time saving in thawing. Yes it’s sturdy, easy to clean and what not, but really doesn’t do anything different to thaw
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Good Product. Just pricey compared to others
customer_reviews.text: The product does as it is expected to do. I wish I would have picked a cheaper set though.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Time saver
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it claims. Really convenient and time saving, especially when you forget to take something out of the freezer.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Chambers

customer_reviews.title: easy and convienent to use is a plus
customer_reviews.text: protective sleeve to prevent scratches would be a nice addition
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you do not scratch it.
customer_reviews.text: I loved it . I use to quickly defrost meats.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fake News
customer_reviews.text: The product doesn’t work unless you heat the metal. So why not just heat the meat.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Stout

customer_reviews.title: Great Way to Speed Thawing
customer_reviews.text: We bought this set to replace a thawing plate that was lost in our move. These ones are great! Although a bit thinner than my old one, they work very well. I use them to thaw chicken breasts, pork chops, steaks, and ground beef. They work great for all of those. Regarding some reviews with complaints about the rubber feet coming off too easily, they are SUPPOSED TO DO SO. You can easily remove them when washing (either in the dishwasher or by hand) so that thawing juices, wash water, and other ick doesn’t build up in the rubber corners.
customer_reviews.author: J. Willis-Opalenik

customer_reviews.title: Believe
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace one we had bought over 10 years ago. They absolutely do work to defrost things. Anyone who says otherwise is expecting miracles. It's not instantaneous., but it cuts the time at least in half.
customer_reviews.author: Boca Lion

customer_reviews.title: Thank.
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I do not like is the rubber corners correct pop off easy other than that it works wonderful thank you.
customer_reviews.author: gilbertalves

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Work wonderfully. It will take 3-4 hours at most to fully defrost straight from freezer but it is much faster than just leaving out or ruining it in the microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Product works as advertized
customer_reviews.text: Works and cuts down defrosting by about 50%. Not as sturdy as expected. Worry rubber feet will come off or get damaged by dishwasher. Lots of crevice's to clean. If I had to do this again, would try another manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: I returned these as soon as I opened the box, they were much smaller than I thought from the description.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Burden

customer_reviews.title: Really does work!
customer_reviews.text: I was sceptical about this, but it really does work. Thawed a 5 lb. tube of ground beef in about an hour and a half. Easy to clean and stores on edge with my baking sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Horrible tray
customer_reviews.text: No wonder why it not availeble anymore. It is probably because of the returns. You can leave the frozen meat room temperature and it will take the same time.It is a joke. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Need to have this
customer_reviews.text: This thing is wonderful! It works so fast. How many times in the past have I tried to defrost in a hurry with disastrous results!!
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: They don’t thaw the food as fast as it claims but does thaw it slightly faster. The rubber feet are continuously falling off which is a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia

customer_reviews.title: That it is so easy to find on Amazon!!!
customer_reviews.text: To defrost items quickly when you have not decided what you are having for dinner!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie

product_meta.title: CQ Essentials | Time Saving | Rapid Thaw Food Defrosting Tray Plate Set | Thaws Frozen Food Faster | No Electricity | No Chemicals | No Microwave | Set of 2 Sizes
product_meta.description: Item Package Quantity:1An absolute must-have in the kitchen! The perfect tool for your Kitchen Arsenal! CQ Essentials Rapid Thaw Food Defrosting Tray Set of 2 Sizes, or Thaw Plates, are high quality and BPA Free. A product that is extremely durable, paint never fades and dishwasher safe. Defrost your meat, fruits and vegetables in LESS the time: Meats can take 30 mins to 1 hour (depending on the thickness of meat) and fruits/vegetables take WAY less time. Whether you’ve forgotten to thaw your food, or you want to speed up the process, just place it on the tray on your kitchen counter, and let it go to work! Your food will defrost faster than if you were just setting it out on a plate. Thawing time will depend on the thickness of the food, and you can use this from any meats to vegetables and any other food that needs thawing. When you’re finished, toss it in the dishwasher as it’s dishwasher safe and you’ll be ready to use it again! The perfect size! You're able to easily store the Defrosting Tray anywhere throughout the kitchen.We want you to be classy, the center of attention and the HERO when preparing meals!! Our products are in high-demand with quality style that is incomparable from competitors. Doesn’t everyone like saving time and making life easier? To start using your CQ Essentials Rapid Thaw Food Defrosting Tray Set of 2 Sizes, click “ADD TO CART” and order yours today! Experience CQ Essentials - the absolute best, highest quality premium defrosting tray set available in the market. America’s #1 Premium Defrosting Tray Set , designed to help make your life easier.
feature_bullets: ✔️ DEFROST FROZEN FOODS FASTER thanks to this magical defrosting plate. Our LARGE, spacious rapid thawing tray thaws chicken breasts, steak, pork, vegetables and more in less than half the time, depending on the thickness and room temperature. Saves you time and effort.

✔️NO CHEMICALS OR ELECTRICITY NEEDED: Yes! You read that right!! This meat thawing tray requires no electricity as opposed to microwave ovens that partially cook the food during the defrosting process, this CQ Essentials Tray defrosts all meats EASILY, SAFELY and QUICKLY!!!

✔️NO PREHEATING OR HOT WATER REQUIRED: The Magical defrost tray stays cool to the touch throughout its use. Simply place frozen food onto this rapid thaw defrosting tray and enjoy all the convenience from this amazing rapid defrosting tray.

✔️ SUPERIOR QUALITY - Made of high-quality extra-thick (3mm) aluminum, this non-stick defrost tray is every kitchen lover’s dream come true! An all-in-one thawing solution for the modern cook, incredible convenience and zero hassles! DISHWASHER SAFE, easy to wash, durable, and reusable.

✔️ BUY WITH CONFIDENCE- Here at CQ Essentials we give you the best bang for your buck! We offer the absolute best thawing tray on the market! With a 100% risk free purchase you can buy with utmost confidence. If for any reason you aren’t happy, simply contact us and we would love to replace or refund the product for you. Other Words Customers Used to Find This Product: rapid thaw heating tray, rapid thaw defroster
